description:
The GVP Ontology defines classes, properties and values ([`skos:Concept`](https://triplydb.com/w3c/skos/table?subject=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2004%2F02%2Fskos%2Fcore%23Concept)s) used in GVP LOD.

As of version 3.0, it is complete regarding [AAT](/getty/aat), [TGN](/getty/tgn) and [ULAN](/getty/ulan), and will be extended in time with more elements needed for other GVP vocabularies (CONA).

It uses the [SKOS](/w3c/skos), [SKOS-XL](/w3c/skos-xl), ISO 25964; [DC](/dcmi/dce), [DCT](/dcmi/dct), [BIBO](/none/bibo), [FOAF](/none/foaf), [BIO](/none/bio), [Schema](/none/sdo), [PROV](/w3c/prov), [WGS84](/w3c/wgs84) ontologies.
name: Getty Vocabulary Program (GVP)
